Pre-Game Insights: The match was a significant one for Greece, as it marked their first victory over England.
Greece dedicated the match to their late teammate George Baldock, adding emotional weight to the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Lee Carsley expressed disappointment with the result and acknowledged England's performance.
Greece's players and coach paid an emotional tribute to George Baldock, highlighting the significance of the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was Greece's first win at Wembley and their first victory over England in history.
The game was overshadowed by the emotional dedication to George Baldock, a former Greece player who passed away.
